section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 25, 2023.*
section.heading: Additional available remedies.

para.text: Nothing in this subchapter shall be construed to prevent:
A proposed guardian or vulnerable youth from seeking any other remedy or protections available under District law; or
The court from issuing judicial determinations similar to those in §16-2399.07(b) in any other proceeding concerning a noncitizen under age 18.

codify:insert.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 25, 2023.*

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 16-2409 of Vulnerable Youth Guardianship Protection Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-203, Aug. 1, 2023, 70 DCR 10758).
